item.title: Deploying Quarkus Serverless apps with Datagrid on Red Hat OpenShift Platform
item.description: This article demonstrates how we can deploy Quarkus apps as Serverless and connect it to Red Hat DataGrid on Red Hat OpenShift Platform. The demo provides yamls which use prebuilt images stored in quay.io. Deploying Quarkus Serverless apps with Datagrid on Red Hat OpenShift Platform
